mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( `outboundDate` , '%Y-%m-%d') AS `formatted_date` , GROUP_CONCAT( `name`) AS `name_list` , sum( `outboundCount`) AS `count` FROM `DirectOutboundGoods` GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `outboundDate` , '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( `allotTime` , '%Y-%m-%d') AS `formatted_date` , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT `name`) AS `name_list` , sum( `quantity`) AS `count` FROM `AllotOutbound` GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `allotTime` , '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( `outboundDate` , '%Y-%m-%d') AS `formatted_date` , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT `name`) AS `name_list` , sum( `outboundCount`) AS `count` FROM `OrderOutboundGoods` GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( `outboundDate` , '%Y-%m-%d')
